LanguageData.Apparel_TribalA.label: 部落装
LanguageData.Apparel_TribalA.description: 一件用原始工具制成的衣物。
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.label: 风雪大衣
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.description: 一件厚重的风雪大衣，即使在最寒冷的温度中也能保持温暖。
LanguageData.Apparel_Pants.label: 裤子
LanguageData.Apparel_BasicShirt.label: T恤衫
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.label: 衬衫
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.description: 一件好看的、带有纽扣的有领衬衫。
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.label: 防尘大衣
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.description: 一件长型的防尘大衣，用于沙漠中阻隔阳光、炎热和沙尘。
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.label: 夹克
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.description: 一件坚固的夹克，可以避免擦伤和刮伤，以及在寒冷天气中保持温暖。
LanguageData.Apparel_PlateArmor.label: plate armor
LanguageData.Apparel_PlateArmor.description: Overlapping solid plates of armor covering the entire body from neck to feet.
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakVest.label: flak vest
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakVest.description: A vest with armor plates inserted on the chest and back. Protects against gunfire.
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakPants.label: flak pants
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakPants.description: A pair of pants with armor plates sewn in. Protects against gunfire.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.label: 动力装甲
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.description: 来自先进的闪耀世界行星的动力装甲，通常装备于突击部队。
